Open Source Software used in OakPlanet
-----------------------------------

All of the dependencies that [OakPlanet](https://github.com/n-suudai/OakPlanet) needs to build or run.

### nedmalloc

* [nedmalloc - GitHub](https://github.com/ned14/nedmalloc)
